fees.waiverText: Annual fee waived on spends of ₹4,00,000 or more in an anniversary year

declaredWelcomeBenefits.description: Complimentary Swiggy One and MMT Black Elite memberships on spends of ₹1,00,000 within first 90 days of card issuance

benefits.description: Complimentary international lounge access via Priority Pass for primary and add-on cardholders
Travel and purchase protection insurance benefits
Low foreign currency markup fee of 2%

milestones.declaredReward: ₹1,500 worth brand vouchers on quarterly spends of ₹1.5 lakh
₹5,000 flight voucher on annual spends of ₹5 lakh
Additional ₹5,000 flight voucher on reaching ₹7.5 lakh annual spends

declaredConstraints.description: Earn 4 Reward Points for every ₹150 spent on retail transactions
Earn 5X Reward Points on spends with partner brands such as Myntra, Nykaa, Marks & Spencer, and Reliance Digital
Maximum reward points that can be earned in a statement cycle is 50,000
Reward Points are not applicable on fuel, rent, wallet loads, government transactions, and other excluded categories
Reward Points redemption value varies by category when redeemed via HDFC SmartBuy portal

declaredEligibility.description: Applicant must be an Indian national
Salaried individuals: Net monthly income of ₹1,00,000 or more
Self-employed individuals: Annual ITR of ₹12 lakh or more
